content.text: Belnar was the peaceful homeworld of the Khil species. It was covered in advanced metropolises, wide open spaces, and dank marshes.
The world was discovered by the Galactic Republic between 30,000 BBY and 25,000 BBY, and had joined it before 22,000 BBY.
It was an early member of the New Republic.
Belnar's largely untouched swamps were the site of many research expeditions by offworld scientists.

elements.text: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 31: Turnabout
Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies
